short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn 400 common Spanish words while watching YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock Spanish covers the browser window periodically with a english word and prompts you to type in the Spanish translation. Once you have the right answer the screen unlocks and you can continue watching. Set your own intervals and choose which topics to focus on.
